result.eng: If you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ga: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.orig: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannach
result.html: Má chailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a cheannachIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.
result.ponchtml: Má ċailleann tú é is féidir leat ceann nua a ċeannaċIf you lose it, you can buy a new one.

result.eng: I can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ga: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.orig: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannach
result.html: Ní acmhainn dom carr nua a cheannachI can't afford to buy a new car.
result.ponchtml: Ní acṁainn dom carr nua a ċeannaċI can't afford to buy a new car.
